messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

warnings not going to the assignee owner sent requested item warning for hello guys here today notification about warning reach ticket holder please take relevant action order fix note particular issue refers believe there already defects regarding issue please refer them thank you lead sent requested item warning for ticket close breaching please be advised following ticket close breaching reference number customer summary leaver inventory update center priority request resolution target date assigned engineer ref msg
